body.name: Collive Indoor Door Mat Retro Floor Mat, Non Slip Washable Doormat Quickly Absorb Welcome Mats Low-Pile Front Door Rug Inside Entryway Carpet for Entrance - 32"x48"
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 35 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Non-Slip: Functional surface scrapes shoes and absorbs water, keeping floors clean and dry. The entry rug with a robust anti-slip backing that ensures it stays in place, will reduce the risk of slips and falls.

Easy to Clean: The 32in x 48in washable lightweight rug provides soft comfort underfoot and can be washed in a washing machine for easy care, with a vacuum or shaken out, or sprayed with water and let air dry.

Low profile: The rugs for entryway with approx 1/5 inches in height, the thin design fits under doors and does not get stuck, the low-profile design is hard-wearing, the ideal choice for adding some comfort to high-traffic areas.

Built to Last：Trap dirt, dust and mud at the door. Indoor door mat uses durable materials to help keep the home clean so that the whole home looks tidy and suitable for entry, mudroom, into the kitchen, laundry room, office, etc.
Retro Style: Beautifully crafted in a Traditional design, the elegant vintage doormat features a distressed Oriental style print, providing a perfect statement piece for any welcoming doorway.

Care Instructions: As an ultra-light, ultra-thin and convenient floor mat, Collive door mats indoor in folded packages have been designed with reinforced fabrics that can be pressed down with a book for a few days to restore it to flatness.
body.description: Collive Door Mat Collection A high-definition decorative top surface design constructed of stain-resistant material absorbs moisture and is ideal for scraping dirt from shoes before it's tracked indoors. Designed with resilience against everyday wear-and-tear, this rug is kid and pet friendly, and perfect for high traffic areas of your home such as bedroom, mudroom, kitchen, front door and back door. Elegantly enhance your entryway with the Collive Retro Doormat, add character to the entrance of your home by choosing a door mat with a different pattern and suitable size.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: THE AREA RUG BRAND THAT UNDERSTANDS YOUR NEEDS BEST Collive is a brand dedicated to producing area rug, we’ve dedicated ourselves to providing rugs across a range of styles. Our rug offers a timeless touch of class, and it's great for high and low traffic areas, making the perfect addition to your home decor. Collive Door Mat Collection A high-definition decorative top surface design constructed of stain-resistant material absorbs moisture and is ideal for scraping dirt from shoes before it's tracked indoors. Designed with resilience against everyday wear-and-tear, this rug is kid and pet friendly, and perfect for high traffic areas of your home such as bedroom, mudroom, kitchen, front door and back door. Elegantly enhance your entryway with the Collive Retro Doormat, add character to the entrance of your home by choosing a door mat with a different pattern and suitable size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All around great rug!
reviews.reviewText: This rug gets 5 stars from me in every dept. The quality is very durable and the edging is done very well. It has a very low profile pile so it's perfect for a foyer or entry way where a door opening needs clearance so as not to catch the rug. It lays flat, doesn't bunch up or shift, which was a huge factor for me as I use a wheelchair. It's super light weight but heavy enough to stay in place. Easy to wash and fits in my small portable clothes washer. The colors are true to advertising and look great. I'm definitely going to purchase more for other areas of my home!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars thin door mat
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this mat because it is thin and washable, and it looks pretty to me. I needed a mat for inside my kitchen, by my french door, I needed something thin and washable. This mat fits my space perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not meant for high traffic.
reviews.reviewText: This rug is perfect for the floor of my entrance hall closet. The dimensions covered the floor completely and the pattern is prettier to look at than a bare floor. The rug allows for the placement of wet shoes or boots while protecting the floor. I am very pleased with the purchase but it is thin and I don't think it is something I would recommend for a lot of foot traffic. I haven't tried to clean it yet but I assume I could just shake out any residual dirt or dust.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thin but holding up
reviews.reviewText: It is thin, but holding up well and looks cute. No problems with it sliding on tile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars nice motif, but looks cheap
reviews.reviewText: The very attractive Oriental motif of this rug is let down by the color choice and the way the rug is made. It looks nice from a distance but within about 15 feet it looks incredibly cheap. This is mostly because of the colors, especially the weird orange and the white background which should be cream/off-white, but also because of the way the rug is made and its materials. It has a very short nap with obvious tufts. Sort of like cheap doll hair?I have other inexpensive washable Oriental motif rugs made by other companies that are better overall than this one. Those other rugs are flat woven and generally feel much higher quality. Obviously none of them are anything like real Oriental rugs, but sometimes you want something you don’t mind if it gets trashed.I did not return this rug as it is a slightly hard to find size that fits perfectly in its spot. But I won’t be sad when it needs to be replaced and I will not buy this one again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks nice, serves purpose
reviews.reviewText: This small rug was bought to replace towels my husband put at the front door to absorb water (rain, snow). Instead this rug is pretty if you like the distressed colors but more importantly the door opens easily over the rug. No more wet floor or clumsy towel. End of problem!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Color and description are accurate
reviews.reviewText: The entry rugs are as described, they are beautiful, low pile so doors slide easily over them. I have not laundered them yet, I’ll post later if any problems with fading or colors running.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for mudroom cubby
reviews.reviewText: The rugs are very pretty and were the perfect size for me to fold and use as floor mats in our mudroom shoe cubbies.
